question:
Dimas:Hi doni (1)....    Doni:fahri?
Dimas:yes he is the new student from salatiga
Doni:oh,Dimas:Hi doni (1)....
Doni:fahri?
Dimas:yes he is the new student from salatiga
Doni:oh,the one who is little big fat and wears glasses?
Dimas:thats right do you know where he is now?
Doni:i think he is in the library he usually (2)...his break there
Dimas:he is very fond of reading isnt he?
Doni:yes i often see him reading a book 
Dimas:okay,thank you i'll see him in the library nowthe one who is little big fat and wears glasses?
Dimas:thats right do you know where he is now?
Doni:i think he is in the library he usually (2)...his break there
Dimas:he is very fond of reading isnt he?
Doni:yes i often see him reading a book 
Dimas:okay,thank you i'll see him in the library now


Whats is the appropriate expression to complete the dialog
A.Who is the boy
B.Is the boy Fahri
C.Do you know Fahri
D.What does Fahri do

2.	What is the correct form of verb to complete the sentence? 
A.spent
B.spend
C.spends
D.is spending

3.	“He is very fond of reading, isn’t he? The underlined word has similar meaning as …. 
A.interesting
B.loving
C.boring
D.tiring​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. C

2.A

3. A

Penjelasan:

kalau salah mohon maaf yaa

tolong dibenarkan ya kalau salah ya kak

Text for nomber 8-11
My name is Raditia. I went to BorobudurTemple last weekend. I went there with my
classmates and teachers. We went there by bus.It was a program of my school to learn
Indonesia history.
I was so amazed seeing the temple. It's so wonderful. It's Hindu-Buddhist temple. It's was
built in nith century by Sailendra dynasty. My friends and I really noticed our guide who told
about the history of th temple. The guide ,Mr Tom explained evey single thing about the temple
very clearly and detail. I also took several pictures in the temple.Beside I get knowledgeabout
Borobudur temple.I enjoy the view.It's was my that I will never forget.

d. The stupa
11.
a.
b.

To take the Borobudur temple picture

To spend a lo of money

d.​

related_questions.question: Read the memo below and answer the questions.memoto : departement managersfrom : mr. charles chavezdate : february 8. 2008subject : monthly managerial meetingour monthly managerial meeting is scheduled for february 27.2009. in the management meeting room at 09.00 a.m.please bring your monthly report with you and submit it to my secretary 30 minutes prior to the meeting.questionswho are the recipient ?
When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin

Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does

a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does

c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

25. C. light skin
